text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- First Lady Leila Ben Ali on Tuesday chaired a cultural show in the resort of Hammamet on the occasion of Women's Day.
- Tunisia has issued 12.5 billion yen of 4.35 percent 20-year Samurai bonds.
- Tunisian Foreign Affairs Minister Abderrahim Zouari and visiting Luxembourg Secretary of State Georges Wohlfart on Tuesday discussed ways to reinforce bilateral cooperation.
- A Greenpeace ship is visiting La Goulette port in a mission to fight the dangerous seaweed "Caulerpa Taxifolia".
